subtasks: Divide hair into three sections (top, middle, bottom)
Pass index finger under middle section
Grab hair from right side, forming new middle section
Pass index finger under new middle section
Grab hair from left side
Continue passing index finger under sections and grabbing hair from sides
Repeat process to create braided effect
Allow hair to stick to head using product (e.g., gel or wax) as a mask

Insert the index finger under the middle section.
Insert hair from the right side into the middle section.
Insert the index finger under the new middle section.
Insert hair from the left side into the middle section.
Repeat steps until the desired length of the braid is achieved.
